title: 游戏不能打开
author: DUELIST
txt_content:
输出日志：
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.2.217.1147 for Minecraft 1.7.2 loading
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM, version 1.8.0_31, running on Windows 7:x86:6.1, installed at D:\Java
[11:36:59] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod codechicken.core.launch.CodeChickenCorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[11:36:59] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod lain.mods.inputfix.InputFix does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[11:36:59] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod codechicken.nei.asm.NEICorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[11:36:59] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod mods.flammpfeil.slashblade.asm.CorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[11:36:59] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[11:36:59] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
    at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_31]
    at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_31]
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]

没装MOD的1.8.1可以打开，但其他版本皆打不开……请问这是什么原因，windows7，32位，JAVA8 Update 31
以上……连进程都没有，内存怎么调低都没办法[实际内存1.99g]

replies.author: yunyou50_75
replies.txt_content:
把Java8换成Java7，绝对的可以。因为1.8.X的版本已经不兼容Java7的运行环境了，反而Java8被应用了。所以1.8.？以上 用 Java8
1.7.？以下 用 Java7

望采纳！

mod冲突吧。。。楼i在是不是装了新模组？？

也可能是模组太多。你把游戏内村【在启动器调】弄成900
就好啦~~~~~


希望采纳/最佳

replies.author: dhwshr
replies.txt_content:
。。设置一下就好了
桌面上右键——属性——最后一个框——高级——疑难解答中把那个条向前挪4个格子，关闭directx加速
。。。
试试吧

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

现在Java7应该还没过期吧= = 建议去官网或者百度一个java7的离线安装包
